ai-tha-ap230:0.3_0: He went to the Makuṭabandhana’s monastery with senior monks.
ai-tha-ap230:2.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap230:2.2_0: the best I was worshipped in those worthy.
ai-tha-ap230:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap230:2.4_0: I’ve been born in the awakening.
ai-tha-ap230:3.1_0: From here the six classes of rebirth.
ai-tha-ap230:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap230:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mithilā.
ai-tha-ap230:6.1_0: Eight senior monks who were invitation in ruined by curmbals.
